  import os

+ try:
      from decouple import config
+ except ImportError:
+     # å¦‚æœpython-decoupleæœªå®‰è£…ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨os.environä½œä¸ºåå¤‡
+     def config(key, default=None, cast=None):
+         value = os.environ.get(key, default)
+         if cast and value is not None:
+             return cast(value)
+         return value
